review: I had severe gum problem and bad breadth. Consulted Dr. Keerti on friends reference. Very happy to say that she was very friendly and explained my problem very well. I underwent laser gum surgery at krutika dental. treatment was very painless staff were also very good. I recommend krutika dental for all.

Took my mother to this clinic for implants treatment. Doctors are well qualified and took utmost care during entire procedure . Dr. Keerthi explained each and everything very clearly before starting the procedure. Staff are very polite too and did timely followups. I will recommend this clinic  to others too
